Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I am looking for an upper stage parts pack, which would allow me to make something like the proposed Exploration Upper Stage or something along those lines. Maybe I have missed a mod or so, but I think apart from SSTU, which is quite WIP still and the Talisar upper stage, which is part of CMES, there is no independent (and recent) heavy upper stage model out there, isn't it?

Regards and thanks,

Sebastian

I have taken the upper stage from Talisar from Chaka Monkey Exploration systems and rescaled it to the 3.75 m form factor. I further mated it to the AK10 engines from Aerojet Kerbodyne and attempted a slight rebalance to have it fit to the Aerojet Kerbodyne ICPS upper stage. No further changes made.

If I read the license correctly, it could be redistributed, if anybody is interested.
